/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and lampposts, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, painted in hues of red and orange, add a vibrant splash of color to the scene. Cars can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
